snippet: Officials have said Lyft does not meet safety requirements and is not authorized to dispatch cars to pick up riders in New York.
abstract: Car-hailing service Lyft delays its New York debut in Brooklyn and Queens after city and state officials say company does not meet safety requirements and is not authorized to dispatch cars to pick up riders in New York.
lead_paragraph: Officials have said Lyft does not meet safety requirements and is not authorized to dispatch cars to pick up riders in New York.

headline.main: Car-Hailing Service, Lyft, Postpones Its Debut in New York
headline.print_headline: Car-Hailing Service, Lyft, Postpones Its Debut in City
